list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: each of the small, thin horny or bony plates protecting the skin of fish and reptiles, typically overlapping one another.
a thick, dry flake of skin.
an instrument for weighing, originally a simple balance ( a pair of scales ) but now usually a device with an electronic or other internal weighing mechanism.
a graduated range of values forming a standard system for measuring or grading something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: company employees have hit the top of their pay scales
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nhân viên công ty đã đạt đến đỉnh của quy mô lương của họ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the relative size or extent of something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: no one foresaw the scale of the disaster
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: không ai thấy trước quy mô của thảm họa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an arrangement of the notes in any system of music in ascending or descending order of pitch.
a system of numerical notation in which the value of a digit depends upon its position in the number, successive positions representing successive powers of a fixed base.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the conversion of the number to the binary scale
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Việc chuyển đổi số thành quy mô nhị phân

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the range of exposures over which a photographic material will give an acceptable variation in density.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he scales the fish and removes the innards
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ta vảy cá và loại bỏ các bên trong

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: some men scaled less than ninety pounds
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một số đàn ông quy mô ít hơn chín mươi pounds

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: climb up or over (something high and steep).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Kẻ trộm thu thành một hàng rào 8 feet

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: represent in proportional dimensions; reduce or increase in size according to a common scale.
